nodes.text: The Collective was a model of speeder bike produced by Prinawe during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The Prinawe Collective was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan as a reward for those who attended the Community Cantina Tour at Gamescom in August 2015. The third in a series of Cantina Tour rewards, the Collective is shareable by players; they can give codes to other players so they can acquire the mount themselves.
